function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High percentage of respondents seeking personalized adaptation of apartments","Impact":"Increased risk of infectious disease spread due to high number of personal modifications to building layouts","Mitigation":"Education on infection control measures, standardized building design guidelines","Technologies":"Building information modeling (BIM), virtual reality design tools","People":"Future apartment buyers, architects, developers","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Preference for living in houses over apartments","Impact":"Potential lower density and more open spaces in houses may reduce infection risk","Mitigation":"Promotion of high-quality ventilation and sanitation in apartment buildings, urban planning for green spaces","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems, air purifiers, sanitation technologies","People":"Current and future residents of apartments, urban planners","Owner":"City government, real estate developers"},{"Description":"Statistically significant predictors of satisfaction with living in apartments during the pandemic","Impact":"Potential increase in risk perception and dissatisfaction with apartment living during a pandemic","Mitigation":"Public health campaigns on infection control, mental health support for apartment dwellers","Technologies":"Telemedicine services, community health apps, virtual support groups","People":"Apartment residents, public health organizations","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health professionals"}]}
